detail_desc: 5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. V-shaped opening at the top and a collar with ties at the front. Pleat at the back of the neck, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and a round neckline with gathers at the front.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Shorts in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative drawstring. Zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck with ties at the front, and a square neckline at the back. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Flounces around the neckline front and back, and a seam at the waist.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back. long sleeves with buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with 3/4-length flounced sleeves, side pockets and no buttons. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester. Piqué section over the foot, elasticated tops and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Heart-shaped sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a small frilled collar and long, wide sleeves with scalloped trims. Decorative flounces at the front and a straight-cut hem.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with frill-trimmed shoulder straps and elastication at the back. Buttons down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and button placket.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a collar and drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Button details at the neckline and cuffs.
Slides in faux fur with a small platform. Rubber soles. Platform approx. 3 cm.
Non-padded, underwired bras in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket with a contrasting colour lining that can be used as a handkerchief, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top and short, narrow shoulder straps. Lace trim around the armholes.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit with press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. Top with long raglan sleeves and press-studs down one side. Trousers with an elasticated waist and full feet with elastication at the heels. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit hat in a soft blend of mulberry silk and cotton with a roll-edge hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a text print, wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Checked shirt in soft cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Longer-style, 5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Soft organic cotton jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut shirt in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem.
Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Loose-knit, mohair-blend jumper in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft, gently draping Tencel™ lyocell denim with a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and fake back pockets. Soft jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with shoulder straps that cross at the back and fasten at the back of the waistband with press-studs. Elastication at the back, press-studs at the crotch and elastication with decorative gathers at the hems.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and long raglan sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Gathers at the shoulders and a seam with ties at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed collar, button placket with corozo nut buttons and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.
Set with swim shorts and a patterned swim top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long sleeves and a frill trim at the hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined crotch. UPF 50.
One satin scrunchie and one chiffon scrunchie, both with a large, sewn-on bow.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.

Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft organic cotton denim with buttons down the front, a collar and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Oversized cardigan in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck tunic in a cool, softly draping viscose weave with a stand-up collar, buttons down the front and narrow ties under the bust. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Top in soft jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a decorative chiffon bow at the top and short puff sleeves.

Shirt in a striped viscose weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Hi-tops in glittery imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and an adjustable hook and loop tab. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.
Trousers in a viscose weave with jacquard-weave stripes. Regular waist and an extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and contrasting colour double sleeves.

Straight-cut blouse in airy, crinkled cotton with embroidered details. Small frilled collar with ties and an opening at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with flounced, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.

Chimi x H&M. Stash your stuff in one place and stay on trend too. This stylish shoulder bag has space for a wallet, mobile phone and suncream too. Made from woven fabric, it has a zip at the top, is lined inside and has an open inner compartment. The front also has an open compartment in transparent plastic. The contrasting colour shoulder strap is adjustable and comes with metal carabiner hooks so that you can carry it in lots of different ways. A separate carabiner hook with a shorter strap is also included – perfect for your keyring. Depth of bag 4 cm. Width 16 cm. Height 20 cm. Adjustable length of shoulder strap 72-130 cm.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a round neck and long sleeves.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waistband.

Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with adjustable frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Open section at the back with ties, a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Fabric belts with a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Long, V-neck satin dress with short cap sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a straight skirt with a high slit at the front. Lined.
Lace balconette bra with moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Top in supersoft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline. Longer at the back. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Suede loafers with a decorative strap and seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in one side. Unlined.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, longer legs and laser-cut edges. Light shaping effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim, two buttons, a zip fly, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved jacket dress in a crêpe weave with narrow notch lapels, a concealed wrapover fastening at the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.

Shirt jacket in sturdy cotton denim with smooth buttons. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke and decorative seam at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dress in crinkled jersey with a super-voluminous skirt in four layers of tulle. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a shimmering tone-on-tone elastic trim at the waist.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Shirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shimmering metallic leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastener. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
